data.title: Carlos Delfino Player Profile, Los Angeles Clippers
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Carlos Delfino on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 2003 - The Detroit Pistons selected Carlos Delfino in Round 1 with Pick 25 in the 2003 NBA Draft. Jul 14, 2004 - Carlos Delfino signed a multi-year contract with the Detroit Pistons. Oct 20, 2006 - The Detroit Pistons exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Carlos Delfino. Jun 15, 2007 - Carlos Delfino was acquired by the Toronto Raptors from the Detroit Pistons in exchange for a 2009 2nd round pick (TOR own) and a 2011 2nd round pick (TOR own). Jun 20, 2008 - The Toronto Raptors tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Carlos Delfino a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2008 - Carlos Delfino, previously with the Toronto Raptors, became a free agent. Jul 7, 2009 - The Toronto Raptors withdrew their Qualifying Offer to make Carlos Delfino an Unrestricted FA. Aug 18, 2009 - Carlos Delfino was acquired by the Milwaukee Bucks, along with Roko Ukic and a TPE, from the Toronto Raptors in exchange for Amir Johnson and Sonny Weems. Aug 18, 2009 - Carlos Delfino signed a multi-year contract with the Toronto Raptors as part of an eventual sign and trade to Milwaukee Bucks. Jul 1, 2012 - Carlos Delfino, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Aug 20, 2012 - Carlos Delfino signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets. Jun 30, 2013 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of Carlos Delfino on waivers. Jul 2, 2013 - Carlos Delfino, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jul 17, 2013 - Carlos Delfino signed a multi-year contract with the Milwaukee Bucks. Aug 26, 2014 - Carlos Delfino was acquired by the Los Angeles Clippers, along with Miroslav Raduljica, a conditional 2015 2nd round pick (LAC own) and a Least Favorable 2016 2nd round pick, from the Milwaukee Bucks in exchange for Jared Dudley and a conditional 2017 1st round pick (LAC own). Aug 29, 2014 - The Los Angeles Clippers placed the contract of Carlos Delfino on waivers.
